parts.text: [{"extra_ingredients": "salt, pepper, olive oil", "recipe_instructions": "1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 2. Chop carrots and bell peppers into bite-sized pieces. 3. Toss vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper. 4. Spread on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender and slightly browned. 5. Serve as a side dish.", "recipe_name": "Roasted Vegetables"}, {"extra_ingredients": "salt, pepper", "recipe_instructions": "1. Cook the Impossible Burger according to package directions. 2. While the burger cooks, dice the tomatoes. 3. Season the cooked burger with salt and pepper. 4. Serve the burger on a bun (if you have one) or alongside the diced tomatoes.", "recipe_name": "Impossible Burger with Tomatoes"}, {"extra_ingredients": "Pasta, olive oil, garlic", "recipe_instructions": "1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. While pasta cooks, sauté minced garlic in olive oil until fragrant. 3. Add diced tomatoes and cook until softened. 4. Drain pasta and add it to the sauce. 5. Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper to taste.", "recipe_name": "Simple Tomato Pasta"}, {"extra_ingredients": "Salt, pepper, butter", "recipe_instructions": "1. Melt butter in a pan. 2. Add green beans and cook until tender-crisp. 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 4. Serve as a side dish.", "recipe_name": "Sauteed Green Beans"}, {"extra_ingredients": "Salt, pepper", "recipe_instructions": "1. Cook chicken breast in a pan or bake in the oven until cooked through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 2. Serve with a side of roasted vegetables (see recipe above).", "recipe_name": "Simple Baked or Pan-Fried Chicken"}]
